Title: Relates to the sufficiency of the number of judges and justices in districts and courts
Summary: Directs the legislature to ensure that the number of judges and justices in districts and courts is sufficient; directs the chief administrator of the courts to report on the sufficiency of the number of judges and justices in each court and to make recommendations on such numbers.
LawCode: Add ยง219-f, amd ยง212, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to the sufficiency of the number of judges and justices in districts and courts
